4.eng: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus
4.sxb: Kirio eking’ana ekilala kieng’ene ekia osugaane omanye ku kiomo Coronavirus

12.sxb: Enyende eno eilanzia ne entone/ amatone ezia amate aga

13.eng: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.
13.sxb: Weera ale. Owuliire owua emiita iwiri  wuuza okukuta ale kugere amatone amakate-kaate aga amate gareke okukutuukako

17.eng: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:
17.sxb: Kutio no owuine omuntu  na akolola/nari omulwire/aisiamula mbwe:

18.eng: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.
18.sxb: Wa-ee ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa. Awantu waesa okukolola namba okuisiamula mu ekintu ekio ni ngawaesa  okulanzizia awandi owulwire owuo yaaya.

22.eng: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself
22.sxb: Andi omuntu ono ngari omulwire yaaya, ni airinda kugere atatuukra owulwire

23.eng: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious
23.sxb: Awantu awalwire waesa okuwula ne ewilago ewilagana mbwe wari no owulwire, ni wakiaesa okulanzia owulwire

24.eng: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.
24.sxb: Owukirre wiona, ne ekintu ekilootu no omuntu aweere ale no omuganda ogwa awantu, aeniki ngoesa waamanya omuntu omulwire agati yaawu ao.

28.sxb: Ewintu ewisinyiriziwua kugere  elifiti eginga awantu eniine namba eike

32.eng: & even on the outside of your face mask
32.sxb: Enze eya ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa

33.sxb: Ewintu ewiambwako no oniina ku egoroofa

38.eng: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…
38.sxb: Kukawa kutio, enyinga zindi amate aga omulwire gaesa okutoonya ku ewintu windi kiomo….

39.sxb: No owulwire wuno wuuza wuawamba mwona

42.eng: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,
42.sxb: No oizukirre oambe ku ewintu wino nikuemao oambe ekieni kiao,

43.eng: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.
43.sxb: Kandi engira endala endootu eya oesa okumala nayo enyende zino ni, no ozioziizie ne esabuuni, ekintu ekifumia ikwe namba amanzi agazoganiiwue na amalwa

44.eng: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,
44.sxb: Enyende zino ziesa okuwa endamu  ku enyinga ezisugire

47.eng: Which is why it is also good to follow these
47.sxb: Ekio nikio ekigera ni kuri kulootu okulonda

48.eng: wash with soap up to here

51.eng: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.
51.sxb: Ota-amba ku ekieni kiao. (Namba ekieni ekia omwina waao.) Ni, ni kuri mbwe paka owiambeko, ni sooka oisaawe geeza ino ne esabuuni

52.eng: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice
52.sxb: okuemba olwembo olwa ‘Happy Birthday” kawiri kutoola esekendi amakumi awiri ago

56.eng: wash the back of your hands
56.sxb: No okuozia enze eya amakono gaao

58.eng: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.
58.sxb: Ni no okiambireko, no omwoyo gwao gutainyaasia yaaya. Ni toola esabuuni oisaawe nayo.

59.eng: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.
59.sxb: Lwona ni kuesekana ota-amba enze eya ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa ekio.

61.eng: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long
61.sxb: No oiwooye ekintu ekio ku amiire amangi, enyende zimenya munsi yakio

62.eng: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!
62.sxb: No omiire okukola ne ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa, kirigize ale. Kola ni kilala owuire ki owuire.

63.sxb: Muiwule ne ekijiiko ekia okuiwula ewiokuria

67.sxb: Omuntu ki omuntu awe ne etawulo yaae

68.eng: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.
68.sxb: Mutasangirizia ewiokuria, endaawo, ewinyweero no etawulo ezia okuieya

69.eng: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried
69.sxb: Namba okagezaania owufwana wutie, ne enkumbo yaao ngeesa yatuuka ku ekieni kiao yaaya.

70.eng: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.
70.sxb: Nikuesekana igulao kandi oigaleo ekiriango ne enkumbo namba ni iwega riao.

72.eng: and after being out in the public

74.eng: Always wash your hands with soap…

80.eng: Read the articles for more tips!
80.sxb: Soma amang’ana agajojerwe gano kugere owe no okumanya okungi.

81.eng: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
81.sxb: “This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel” by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

82.eng: "The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)
82.sxb: “The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe”, by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign policy, Report.  (Jan 25, 2020)

83.eng: "How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020
83.sxb: “How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands”. By Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, opinion.  (Jan 28,2020)

84.sxb: Asi aa oesa okutuukra amang’ana agagamba-gamba ku owurezi

85.eng:
Additional notes:  Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold, and should be applied in every day life, even when there is no epidemic. 
References:  lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references. ﻿https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.htmlhttps://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/ ﻿https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Additonal lnformation  A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here:﻿﻿https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Sharing Guidelines  This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces. 
When sharing, please remember these 3 points: ﻿1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing.﻿2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project﻿3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow
﻿For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com
85.sxb:
Amang’ana gandi: Amang’ana agagamba-gamba ku okurinda  owueru gatunzia awantu ku kiomo wakairinda kugere wareke okuambwa na amalwire agafwana ni iseeka ne embeyo efumuta omuwiri, kandi awantu wasugaane wakole ewintu wino owuire ki owuire namba no owulwire owuilanzia wuwulao.
Aa okatuukra  amang’ana gano: Amang’ana gano gajojerwe nikulondokana no  okumanya okwa  omuntu yawanga nakwo ku COVID19 nawuno kutuuka etariki 28/2/2020. Yagatuukira na agatoola mu https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention- tips.htmlhttps://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/
https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Amang’ana gandi: Amang’ana gano gajojerwe mu engira eya gataesa okugalusiwua yaaya (A PDF. Gaituukrana wusa mu: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Engira eya okusangirizia ewilagirizio: Awantu wasugaane  watumire awandi woona amang’ana gano ni kuwitira ku engira eya ewidijitaali kiomo Whatsapp ni telegram lwona oesa okugatuukra waagafumia wusa ki emiloome egia okugerera nagio awantu mu emigizi, esikuuli na aa awantu wakola emirimo.
Enyinga ezia oigerera na awandi ni ingirizia amang’ana asatu gano. 1) Otasonga namba ofumie eking’na-uking’ana ekiri mu amang’ana gano. 2) Otakola na amang’ana gano mu engira eya okutuukira amasendi. 3) Enyinga ezia osoma ni tondowola omulongi owa FB no omumanyisia ne @weimankowart ni  mu IG no omumanyisia ne @weimankow, namba no oesana engira eya instagram com/weimankow.Ni wirio ewintu windi ewia oagala okukola, ni tuma okusawa kwao ku comicsforgood@gmail.com

90.eng: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow

92.eng: Otagalusia amang’ana agagambregambrweko ano, ni oesa waagagalusia mu omunwa gundi namba oesa waagata mu engira indi nikuemao waagaesania ku awantu wusaasa aa otaagalamo amasendi. Otagalusia eriina eria omujoji owajoja amang’ana gano kandi omusaati owasaata ewiiruuzia wino oetwa mbwe Weiman Kou.

bookText.eng:
About Coronavirus



There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus
SPREADS
Mouth
Nose
Eyes
Get into your
Healthy Person
Sick Person
The virus spreads when ﻿these droplets
Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.
1
2m
Achoo!
So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:
Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.
2
Thank you﻿*sniffles*
OR,
Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself
People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious
And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.
Chopsticks
Healthy person
Train straps
Lift buttons
Tissues
Cups
Digital devices
& even on the outside of your face mask
Stair bannisters
Mouse
Pens
Door knobs
Their hands
However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…
you might all fall sick.
or your loved one's face
rub eyes
And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,
and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.
Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,
soap
precautions
Which is why it is also good to follow these
wash with soap up to here
soap
elbow
Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.
Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice
under the nails
for 20 seconds
between the fingers
wash the back of your hands
What is thoroughly?
If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.
Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.
droplets
*Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long
Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!
Use a serving spoon
Baby
Daddy
Mommy
Everyone gets their own towel
Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.
You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried
Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.
Home
and after being out in the public
Before you eat
Always wash your hands with soap…
And finally,
soap
Stay safe, everyone!
Stay safe, everyone!
soap
Read the articles for more tips!

bookText.spa:
Sobre el Coronavirus





















































































Sobre el Coronavirus
bookText.sxb:
Amang’ana aga Coronavirus



Kirio eking’ana ekilala kieng’ene ekia osugaane omanye ku kiomo Coronavirus

EILANZIA
No omunwa ogwa
Enyindo
Amiiso  
Gatonyere ku
Omuntu omulamu
Omuntu omulwire
Enyende eno eilanzia ne entone/ amatone ezia amate aga
Weera ale. Owuliire owua emiita iwiri  wuuza okukuta ale kugere amatone amakate-kaate aga amate gareke okukutuukako
1
emiita iwiri
Eeethia!
Kutio no owuine omuntu  na akolola/nari omulwire/aisiamula mbwe:
Wa-ee ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa. Awantu waesa okukolola namba okuisiamula mu ekintu ekio ni ngawaesa  okulanzizia awandi owulwire owuo yaaya.
2
Otioo
NAMBA,
Andi omuntu ono ngari omulwire yaaya, ni airinda kugere atatuukra owulwire
Awantu awalwire waesa okuwula ne ewilago ewilagana mbwe wari no owulwire, ni wakiaesa okulanzia owulwire
Owukirre wiona, ne ekintu ekilootu no omuntu aweere ale no omuganda ogwa awantu, aeniki ngoesa waamanya omuntu omulwire agati yaawu ao.
Ewiti ewiogi ewia okuriira
Omuntu omulamu  
Emikanda egia mu egaare
Ewintu ewisinyiriziwua kugere  elifiti eginga awantu eniine namba eike
Etiisiu
Ewikombe
Ewintu ewia ewidijitaali
Enze eya ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa
Ewintu ewiambwako no oniina ku egoroofa
Emaosi eya ekompiuta
Ekalamu
Echabi eya olwigi
Amakono gaawu
Kukawa kutio, enyinga zindi amate aga omulwire gaesa okutoonya ku ewintu windi kiomo….
No owulwire wuno wuuza wuawamba mwona
Namba ekieni ekia omwina waao
Oeye amiiso gaao
No oizukirre oambe ku ewintu wino nikuemao oambe ekieni kiao,
Kandi engira endala endootu eya oesa okumala nayo enyende zino ni, no ozioziizie ne esabuuni, ekintu ekifumia ikwe namba amanzi agazoganiiwue na amalwa
Enyende zino ziesa okuwa endamu  ku enyinga ezisugire
Esabuuni
Engira zino
Ekio nikio ekigera ni kuri kulootu okulonda
Isaawa ne esabuuni paka ano
Esabuuni
Enkumbo
Ota-amba ku ekieni kiao. (Namba ekieni ekia omwina waao.) Ni, ni kuri mbwe paka owiambeko, ni sooka oisaawe geeza ino ne esabuuni
okuemba olwembo olwa ‘Happy Birthday” kawiri kutoola esekendi amakumi awiri ago
Okuozia mu enkumu
Ku esekendi amakumi awiri
Okuozia agati eya ewiala
No okuozia enze eya amakono gaao
okuisaawa geeza ino no okukolaki?
Ni no okiambireko, no omwoyo gwao gutainyaasia yaaya. Ni toola esabuuni oisaawe nayo.
Lwona ni kuesekana ota-amba enze eya ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa ekio.
Amatone/entone
No oiwooye ekintu ekio ku amiire amangi, enyende zimenya munsi yakio
No omiire okukola ne ekintu ekisanikra enyindo no omunwa, kirigize ale. Kola ni kilala owuire ki owuire.
Muiwule ne ekijiiko ekia okuiwula ewiokuria
Omwana
Ise
Ng’ina
Omuntu ki omuntu awe ne etawulo yaae
Mutasangirizia ewiokuria, endaawo, ewinyweero no etawulo ezia okuieya
Namba okagezaania owufwana wutie, ne enkumbo yaao ngeesa yatuuka ku ekieni kiao yaaya.

Nikuesekana igulao kandi oigaleo ekiriango ne enkumbo namba ni iwega riao.
namba,no ori engo
no oema enze aa owerenga,
No okiari okuria,
Weerako no oisaawa ne esabuuni…
Owutuukre,
Esabuuni
Omuntu ki omuntu airinde!
Omuntu ki omuntu airinde!
Esabuuni
Soma amang’ana agajojerwe gano kugere owe no okumanya okungi.
“This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel” by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
“The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe”, by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign policy, Report.  (Jan 25, 2020)
“How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands”. By Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, opinion.  (Jan 28,2020)

Aa okatuukra  amang’ana gano: Amang’ana gano gajojerwe nikulondokana no  okumanya okwa  omuntu yawanga nakwo ku COVID19 nawuno kutuuka etariki 28/2/2020. Enyinga ezia oigerera na awandi ni ingirizia amang’ana asatu gano. 1) Otasonga namba ofumie eking’na-uking’ana ekiri mu amang’ana gano. 2) Otakola na amang’ana gano mu engira eya okutuukira amasendi. 3) Enyinga ezia osoma ni tondowola omulongi owa FB no omumanyisia ne @weimankowart ni  mu IG no omumanyisia ne @weimankow, namba no oesana engira eya instagram com/weimankow.Ni wirio ewintu windi ewia oagala okukola, ni tuma okusawa kwao ku comicsforgood@gmail.com
